metadata.inclusion: Press and hold the button for 3-8 seconds. The LED will flash briefly, then show steady light after 3 seconds - release the button when the LED shows steady light.
metadata.exclusion: Press and hold the button for 3-8 seconds. The LED will flash briefly, then show steady light after 3 seconds - release the button when the LED shows steady light.
metadata.reset: Press the button for more than 10 seconds. The LED will turn off after the device resets to factory defaults.
